page.title: 08Local concerns
page.content: The most common local concern recorded was vandalism. Litter and graffiti are common, particularly in the local shopping precinct. Some people made a link between the above and insufficient leisure activities for young people in the neighbourhood. Although there is an excellent sports centre there is only one small youth club, which is on the fringe of the area. Another common concern was the proxim- ity of the area to the Sizewell Nuclear Power Station, together with the transport of its waste for reprocessing which passes by rail through the area. Comments also showed concern about: the local rating system; volume of through traffic in residential areas; urban planning which leads to office blocks and depopulation of town centre; dogs fouling the pavements.
